section_about_us.title: About Us
section_about_us.description: HADIPURWANTO LAW OFFICE (HLO) is an independent law firm based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Established by dynamic, dedicated, and intelligent lawyers, HLO prioritizes the highest standards of professionalism in all its legal services. Our team of lawyers possesses expertise and wide connections across various sectors, offering exceptional experience in providing tailored legal solutions for every client.

detail.title_protecting: Protecting the Legal Rights and Interests of Our Clients
detail.title_providing: Providing Expert Legal Advice and Representation
detail.title_tailored: Tailored, Professional, and Effective Legal Services
detail.title_experience: Experienced Attorneys in Diverse Areas of Law
detail.quotes_description: Interests, Trusted, Effective, Efficient, Proactive, Communicative.

text.2: is an independent, full service – Indonesian law firm based in the heart of Indonesia capital city, Jakarta. HLO is established by young, dynamic, diligent and intelligent lawyers whom uphold the highest qualities of professionalism, skills and expertise. Our lawyers have knowledge and connections in various sectors which give an excellent experience in providing solutions to every clients problems by means of thorough research, in depth analysis, critical, innovative and creative thinking.
text.3: We are also committed to the highest standards of client service with respect to responsiveness and confidentiality. Our core values comprise of client interests, trust, effective, efficient, proactive, communicative, adaptivity and passionate. We are fully dedicated and committed in helping clients find the right solution for their specific problems and legal matters in the Indonesia.
text.4: Our fully fledged team of lawyers have the skills and experience to identify, gather facts and evidence(s) required to help our clients achieve the best possible outcomes; whether in court, other dispute resolution forums, or in commercial/business transactional scenarios. Our team is able to review the systems, processes, procedures and practices that our client may use in their business operations, to ensure full compliance with applicable Indonesian laws and regulations.
text.5: Our team is capable in providing advisory and supporting services in the field of corporate governance. We possess a deep understanding on how Indonesian regulators, legislators and law enforcers think. Thence allowing us to demonstrate a more effective and strategic method for the best quality-based results and optimum benefits for our clients.

section_practice_areas.title: Practice Areas
section_practice_areas.description: At HADIPURWANTO LAW OFFICE, we offer a wide range of legal services, specializing in both contentious and non-contentious matters. Our experienced attorneys are equipped to provide tailored legal solutions to meet the needs of our diverse clientele.
section_practice_areas.description2: At HADIPURWANTO LAW OFFICE, we offer a comprehensive range of legal services tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our experienced attorneys specialize in various practice areas, providing expert legal solutions across multiple industries.

commercial.title: Commercial Litigation
commercial.description: We specialize in resolving complex business disputes through effective legal strategies and representation.

criminal.title: Criminal Litigation
criminal.description: Defending clients against criminal charges with thorough case analysis and committed legal defense.

state.title: State Administrative Litigation
state.description: We handle disputes involving government authorities, ensuring compliance with state regulations.

civil.title: Civil Litigation
civil.description: Our firm offers expert representation in civil disputes, protecting your rights in court.

government.title: Government Relation
government.description: We assist clients in navigating governmental regulations and advocating for their interests with authorities.

commercial_contract.description: We draft, negotiate, and enforce commercial contracts to safeguard business interests and ensure legal compliance.

international.title: International Business Transaction
international.description: We provide legal counsel on cross-border transactions, ensuring compliance with international laws and regulations.

foreign.title: Foreign & Domestic Investments
foreign.description: Our firm advises on investment opportunities, offering strategic guidance for both local and international investors.

media.title: Media, IT & Telecommunication
media.description: We offer legal support in the media, IT, and telecommunications sectors, protecting intellectual property and ensuring regulatory compliance.

unfair.title: Unfair Competition & Antimonopoly
unfair.description: We provide counsel on antitrust matters, helping businesses avoid unfair competition and comply with antimonopoly laws.

mergers.title: Mergers & Acquisitions
mergers.description: Providing expert legal advice in corporate transactions, from negotiation to finalization.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.description: Protecting your creations and inventions through strategic IP protection and enforcement.

aviation.title: Aviation
aviation.description: We offer legal solutions for the aviation industry, including regulatory compliance, aircraft leasing, and dispute resolution.

banking.title: Banking and Finance Law
banking.description: Offering legal solutions for regulatory compliance, investment, and banking transactions.

construction.description: We assist clients in navigating legal challenges related to construction projects and infrastructure development.

consumer.title: Consumer Protection
consumer.description: We ensure that consumers are protected from unfair practices and defective products through robust legal advocacy.

private.title: Private & Family
private.description: We offer legal support in family matters, including divorce, inheritance, and child custody disputes.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.description: We provide guidance on insurance policies and dispute resolution between insurers and policyholders.

land.title: Land
land.description: Our firm offers legal services in land acquisition, property rights, and real estate transactions.

employment.title: Employment
employment.description: We represent both employers and employees in labor disputes, ensuring fair treatment and compliance with labor laws.

mining.title: Mining
mining.description: We provide legal advice in the mining sector, ensuring compliance with environmental laws and handling regulatory matters.

plantation.title: Plantation
plantation.description: We offer legal expertise in the plantation industry, assisting with land use, environmental issues, and regulatory compliance.

description.paragraf_1: is the Managing Partner of HLO. He graduated in law with cumlaude predicate from Universitas Gadjah Mada in Yogyakarta. He has been practicing law specializing in litigation, commercial dispute settlement, debt collection, commercial contracts in addition to being an expert in civil law, criminal law, private international law, business law, telecommunication law, information and technology law, anti-competition law and corporate law.
description.paragraf_2: Prior to HLO, he has been working in various top tier law firms in Indonesia and a legal aid foundation. Through the years of his practice in law, he has handled various clients: individual, company (private and state-owned), ministry, foundation and organizations. He was also involved as a contributor in an international publication on telecommunication law. He is admitted by the Indonesian Bar Association (PERADI) to represent clients before the court in Indonesia.
description.paragraf_3: At this point in time, he has founded HLO to help client in their business challenges or dispute involved in Indonesia.

description.paragraf_1: is a Senior Associate of Hadipurwanto Law Office. He graduated with double degrees from both the Faculty of Law Gadjah Mada University in 2015 majoring Civil Law and the Faculty of Economics Mercubuana Yogyakarta University in 2016 majoring Management. He also earned his Master's Degree in Law from Gadjah Mada University majoring Business Law graduated in 2018.
description.paragraf_2: Prior to joining Hadipurwanto Law Office in 2021, he was in a law firm in Jakarta and he has recorded a proven success in assisting and representing clients in corporate transaction and restructuring, various corporate investment, restructure, merger and acquisition, and Procurement process to bid Independent Power Plant (IPP).
description.paragraf_3: Since joining Hadipurwanto Law Office, his practices mainly focused on criminal law and commercial litigation. He is also a member of the Indonesian Advocates Association (PERADI) and committed to providing clients with thorough and effective representation. Passionate about advocating for justice and ensuring fair outcomes in the legal system.
